body.p:
Taylorsville Ky
Febry 18"/62
Gov B. Magoffin

Mr Shields will present you a petition from this County signed as well by us as sundry other Citizens of the County whose signatures to the same we believe to be genuine. We are of Opinion that the pardon of Vincent Shields would meet with the hearty approbation of all of our Citizens and we would here repeat the prayer of the petitioner by again asking you to pardon him.

Jonn Davis
Mark E Huston
Tho. J. Barker
R G McKee
Jno. S Howard
Jno B. Wootton
A W. Thomas
